Text: As usual, thanks indeed for all the work
Thank you. We all really appreciate your fine work.
Thks again, keep the good work !

just watched day 8 and there audio and video are slightly out of sync. I really didn't mind, but if you want to fix it for yourself you can do that by using virtualdub (http://www.digital-digest.com/dvd/downloads/showsoftware_virtualdub_346.html)
Just open the avi file with virtualdub, set both audio and video to "direct stream copy";  go to Audio->Interleaving menu and set "delay audio track" value.  Save as AVi.
